name: Befuddled Old Ben
description:
This is a point-and click style adventure puzzle game based on escape rooms. 

Big Ben needs fixing! Traverse London to find the 3 components needed and close the hatch. Don't mind the inhabitants, they're a bit... odd. (See if you can piece together the narrative through their cryptic dialogue!)

This was my first attempt at making a game; I made this using Adventure Game Studio within 2 weeks, and the majority of assets are simple placeholders. I really liked the narrative, so I plan to reincorporate it into my later works!
